MTM.Summary: Facing challenges in college coursework, particularly coding assignments.
MTM.Patterns: struggling with coursework, overwhelmed, realization of workload
MTM.Goals: improve coding skills, manage workload effectively
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to the demands of college life.

LTM.Implications: A major life transition into higher education.

MTM.Summary: Navigating new social environments and relationships.
MTM.Patterns: forming new friendships, feeling disconnected from old friends, awkward interactions
MTM.Goals: deepen new friendships, maintain old connections
MTM.Transition: Adapting to the social dynamics of college life.

MTM.Patterns: existential crises, feeling out of place, adjustment stress
MTM.Transition: Coping with new responsibilities and environment.

MTM.Summary: Encountering financial challenges in a new city.
MTM.Patterns: high cost of living, feeling broke
MTM.Transition: Learning to manage finances in a new context.

MTM.Summary: Questioning life choices and societal expectations.
MTM.Patterns: questioning life choices, disparity between expectations and reality

MTM.Summary: Exploring new opportunities in trading and blockchain.
MTM.Patterns: researching blockchain, seeking internships, market analysis
MTM.Goals: gain practical experience, understand market trends

MTM.Summary: Landed a summer internship through networking.
MTM.Goals: make the most of internship, learn new skills
MTM.Transition: Transitioning from theory to practical experience.

LTM.Implications: Marks the beginning of professional career.
LTM.Lessons: importance of networking, value of practical experience

MTM.Summary: Navigating new social environments and relationships.
MTM.Patterns: forming new friendships, feeling disconnected from old friends, awkward interactions
MTM.Goals: deepen new friendships, maintain old connections
MTM.Transition: Adapting to the social dynamics of college life.

MTM.Patterns: first dates, social events, considering social commitments
MTM.Goals: develop meaningful relationships, balance social life

MTM.Summary: Feeling overwhelmed by college life demands.
MTM.Patterns: stress from deadlines, reliance on caffeine, physical discomfort from weather
MTM.Goals: find balance, reduce stress, adapt to new environment
MTM.Transition: Adjusting to increased pressure and new environment.

MTM.Summary: Engaging with trading and financial tools.
MTM.Patterns: using trading tools, discussing market trends, group chat for financial advice
MTM.Goals: improve financial literacy, make informed investment decisions

MTM.Summary: Reflecting on life's pace and personal authenticity.
MTM.Patterns: feeling life moves fast, questioning societal norms, gratitude for connections
MTM.Goals: gain clarity, develop personal philosophy, embrace authenticity

MTM.Patterns: discovering blockchain applications, researching Ethereum and NFTs
MTM.Goals: understand new technology, explore investment opportunities
